text: dviqtIyA#mupaqdhAya# vyAqnEnaiqva vyAqna(gm) sama#d^^rdhayaqtyapA$n yAttRuqtIyA#mupaqdhAyA#-pAqnEnaiqvApAqna(gm) sama#d^^rdhayaqtyathO$ prAqNairEqvainaq(gm)q sami#ndhEq BUrBuvaqH suvaqriti# svayamAtRuqNNA upa# dadhAtIqmE vai lOqkAH sva#yamAtRuqNNA EqtABiqH Kaluqvai vyAhRu#tIBiH praqjApa#tiqH prA*&jA#yataq yadEqtABiqrvyAhRu#tIBiH svayamAtRuqNNA u#paqdadhA#tIqmAnEqva lOqkAnu#paqdhAyaiqShu - [  ] 24
